## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> of a file for reading/writing/seeking.

Definition at line 628 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h">raw&#95;ostream.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### raw&#95;fd&#95;stream() {#ac9a76e6fdfee784d51393f12ce7c5256}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>raw&#95;fd&#95;stream::raw&#95;fd&#95;stream (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename, std::error&#95;code &amp; EC)</>}>
Open the specified file for reading/writing/seeking.

If an error occurs, information about the error is put into EC, and the stream should be immediately destroyed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h/#l00633">633</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h">raw&#95;ostream.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/raw-ostream-cpp/#l00927">927</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/raw-ostream-cpp">raw&#95;ostream.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### read() {#af64d05ca7d5c140c9a967027408c93a8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ssize&#95;t raw&#95;fd&#95;stream::read (char &#42; Ptr, size&#95;t Size)</>}>
This reads the <code>Size</code> bytes into a buffer pointed by <code>Ptr</code>.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Ptr">The start of the buffer to hold data to be read.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">The number of bytes to be read.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
On success, the number of bytes read is returned, and the file position is advanced by this number. On error, -1 is returned, use <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error()</a> to get the error code.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h/#l00646">646</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h">raw&#95;ostream.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/raw-ostream-cpp/#l00942">942</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/raw-ostream-cpp">raw&#95;ostream.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
